website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive electric razor’s contoured design and pivoting head makes for a more comfortable shave, and its waterproof construction makes cleanup a breeze.
pros: Up to 60 minutes of shaving per charge
Can be used with or without its charging cord
cons: Two hours of recharging time isn’t nearly so bad if you don’t mind shaving in corded mode

customer_reviews.title: WARNING ~ DON'T BUY THIS SHAVER
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely pathetic shaver . . . I've had it for exactly one year and I have been shaving for over 50 years and have never had a worse shave in my life. I just bought a Braun Series 7 and it is absolutely the best shaver I have ever owned. It shaves better than a straight razor!! I am sending my pathetic Remington shaver back to the factory for their bone pile.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Schroder

customer_reviews.title: Needs a chrge level indicator.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shaver. This is the second one I have owned (the first one was stolen). As other reviewers have noted, there is no warning that the battery is almost discharged, until it abruptly stops. A flashing light or something would be very helpful. Other than that this is a great shaver for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim & Renae

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver!
customer_reviews.text: Previously had a Remington XF8700 which had 2 cutters and 1 foil. It worked but it took forever to shave and it never was very close even with a new head/blades. The Remington PF7500C with 2 foils and 1 cutter is a superior razor. I've got a thick grey beard and shave every 2-3 days. It takes me half the time to shave compared to the old razor and the result is a great close best shave. I fully charged the razor when it arrived and so far I've shaved 6 times and still haven't had to recharge. The only thing I would ding Remington on is that they don't include a small travel bag for the razor and charger.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteEagle

customer_reviews.title: QUIET, SMOOTH, BUT VERY, VERY, VERY, VERY SLOW. MEDIOCRE SHAVE.
customer_reviews.text: The shaver is quiet and smooth, but it's very, very, very, very slow. Why? The motor is wimpy, almost toy-like. The quality of the shave, even after you've been VERY thorough and patient, is mediocre. You'll need multiple touch-ups throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Computer_Geek

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver in the shower!
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is very good! I've bought all kinds of electric shavers and, for whatever reason, the more expensive the shaver, the lower the results. I have found that if I use this shaver in the shower using hemp soap, I get great results. I do not have a heavy beard (didn't start shaving until I was about 40).
customer_reviews.author: Chuck S.

customer_reviews.title: Gives a really poor shave!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting miracles out of a modestly priced shaver, but this one just doesn't give a decent shave. Even when you shave for a long time the stubble is very noticeable. I bought it to replace my 20-year-old Braun, but my old shaver still gives a closer shave. Wish I could get new blades for it.
customer_reviews.author: Val Lendaro

customer_reviews.title: I will probably always buy a Remington razor. A 30 year fan!

I have not figured out how to tell how much charge is in the product yet. Just see a green light that blinks sometimes. Small detail.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shave!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect. The Remington shaver I've used for the past 10+ years worked fine, but I was constantly having to use a supplemental clipper to cut random longer hairs on my chin. This model, with its "Intercept" clipper in the middle between the foils, cuts everything. In the five weeks I've used the new shaver, I haven't had a single long hair left behind. The foil cutter does a great job, leaving no whiskers at all. It's easy on my skin, much less irritation than a regular razor blade which I simply cannot use. I'm pleased with my purchase and recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one over many years - it works so well! The newest generation has a trimmer between the screen's - brilliant! If I miss a few days & it's too long to naturally go into the screen, the middle has already dealt with it, allowing the screen to make close work of it! Battery life is excellent, cleaning is easy & replacement screens are inexpensive. If you can get over yourselves & spend less for a shaver, this is the best bang for the buck by far.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Mccollum

customer_reviews.title: Remington shavers have a strange numbering scheme
customer_reviews.text: The numbering of Remington shavers is very confusing. The box has F5200 Series, and PF7500 F5, The instructions that came with the shaver shows PF7500 and the product registration WEB Site has a selection of PF7500 C, PF7500 D or PF7500 XLP. There is no "C", "D" or "XLP" on the box or the instructions. Also, there are no numbers on the actual shaver. Ordering replacement blades is going to be a challenge.

customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Razor stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Initially the trimmer stopped working and then several days later, the razor stopped working as well. Remington promised to send me a replacement razor in 5 to 7 business days as the product was still under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great Shave
customer_reviews.text: I have used Remington electric shavers for years. This is the best shaver Remington has made to date. I am extremely pleased with the closeness of the shave. I used to have 1 or 2 stray hairs. Not with this shaver. I would definitely recommend this to anyone needing a new shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Bad DEal
customer_reviews.text: Razor does not give a close shave. Took 20 minutes to shave. Had to continue to go over and over same area. Worse razor I have every used.

product_meta.title: Remington PF7500 F5 Comfort Series Foil Shaver, Men's Electric Razor, Electric Shaver
product_meta.description: The Remington PF7500 F5 Comfort Series Men’s Foil Shaver is designed for a close comfortable shave. The intercept technology preps longer hairs so that when the foils shave your face you get a smoother result. The pop-up trimmer makes detailing your face and neck for the perfect look easy. Powered by a lithium battery, this shaver provides long-lasting power and torque to the motor for consistent performance through 60 minutes of cordless use. Plus, the Pivot and Flex head seamlessly follows the contours of your face for a close, comfortable shave and clean-up is easy, just rinse the head under the faucet.
feature_bullets: Intercept Shave Technology sits between the foils to pre trim longer hairs to reduce snags and deliver a cleaner result

Pivot and Flex shaver head adjusts to the angles of your face to maintain close contact even in hard to shave areas, QuietDrive Motor vibrates less and is 20 percent quieter, than a previous Remington model
Pop Up Detail Trimmer makes detailing your beard, side burns and back of neck easy to clean, just rinse the head under the faucet
Powerful Lithium Battery has a 60 min runtime with a charge indicator light. And, it has up to 3x longer battery cycle life than traditional NiMH rechargeable batteries
Cordless Or Corded Use gives you the convenience to shave cordless or corded. 5 minute quick charge function provides power for one shave
